doc.field: Occupy Wall Street Archives Working Group Records
Occupy Wall Street Archives Working Group Records

Poster collected on November 14 -- Image of Michael Bloomberg, police officer, and snowstorm over Zuccotti Park, reads "We have to clear that park before the holidays. Turn the H.A.A.R.P. on full blast!! Let's see them occupy the snow."

Poster collected on November 14 -- Image of Michael Bloomberg, police officer, and snowstorm over Zuccotti Park, reads "We have to clear that park before the holidays. Turn the H.A.A.R.P. on full blast!! Let's see them occupy the snow."
22" x 28" White poster paper with pink, purple, and black marker, with clear tape over paper.
